columns.blockSubtitle: To Moms With Love, a Justia Tribute
description: Justia couldn’t do what we do without all of the hard-working mothers on our team. In honor of Mother’s Day, we want to say thanks. Here’s to you, Moms of Justia. :)
The pugs would like to introduce you to their newest work pal's pup! Meet Cicely’s new puppy Betsy. She is a year and a half old, has lots of energy, and loves going for long walks :)
